connect20/chippinpayments.name: connect20/chippinpayments

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/chippinpayments.description: Chippin is a shared payment gateway that allows you, the merchant, the ability to offer group buying for a single order. This means that a customer can split the cost of a purchase with their friends/family.
